data.text: @GinaMariaUS Exactly it’s like they know what Trump wants. It seems like they all want to be like trump or they want Trump to like them. All political so he won’t trash them when they are up for reelection

@TimmyHogan1 I have the same question for this bozo as I’ve had for the anti-vax freaks & the few medical quacks like this guy & Dr. Oz, where is the data supporting your skepticism? Their objections always seem either theoretical or politically motivated by those who assert “liberty”. https://t.co/e9ikWdtIVU
@ThumperHare Definitely should, unfortunately I think DeSantis would find someone just like him. I would hope not, but… #CovidIsNotOver
@ksandnfam That’s what it seems like unfortunately

@TimmyHogan1 COVID is definitely not over

He should loose his ability to practice medicine and harm people
@TimmyHogan1 Doctors are human—and it’s rare but this character should not be within a mile of any patient

@ThumperHare He said DeSantis follower appointed by DeSantis so he hast to do his bidding right? It’s so ridiculous. A doctor should have morals and shouldn’t be so naïve as to think these vaccines don’t work. Obviously they do and we have them in our country‘s crying out for them. #Florida

And you should hear the reasons why it’s not that they are looking out for kids our kids are getting sick they’re looking at data and saying the vaccines do not work. They prevent serious infection & keep you out of the hospital. I’ll never understand some people #CovidIsNotOver
@TimmyHogan1 Too bad the medical board won’t take his license….and if he has a board certification they won’t revoke it for ‘causing harm’
